name: The Lost City of Bhalrim
description:
• A game by Samuel Turnage, Michael Ehrhardt, and Howie Lee

  • Make it 200m below the surface to the hidden city of Bhalrim. Be careful about carrying too much treasure or coins though. The more you have the worse the journey!

  • Be careful about carrying too much gold around. You become a prime target for thieves if you have over 50 gold.

  • Be careful about carrying too much in your bag. If you are carrying over 70kg of treasure in your inventory you will only descend half as fast into the mines.

  • Watch out for cave madness!

  • You can find useful information from the merchant or other miners down in the mines.

  • The merchant will give you more gold for your treasure than other miners, but you will have to start your trek into the mountain all over again.
